content.question: One key interaction that Congress has with the bureaucracy as part of the iron triangle is to

choices.label: increase the budget and authority of the bureaucracy to regulate industry
fire civil servants who refuse to implement policies that regulate industry
lobby on behalf of regulations that it wants the bureaucracy to implement
conduct research on public policy issues for the bureaucracy

content.answer: increase the budget and authority of the bureaucracy to regulate industry
